result.description: A table_name field allows the user to choose any table derived from the table specified by this attribute. By default, the base table itself is also included in the choice list (but see skip_root to turn off this behavior).
result.label: Base table
result.name: base_table
result.value_description: Name of base table

result.description: Specifies the Java class that will generate the names used to display the choices in a slush bucket. If absent, the usual display values are used.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any reference field in a many-to-many table.
result.label: M2M namer
result.name: mtmnamer
result.value_description: A binary Java class name.

result.description: Specifies which tags are indexed on the table.
result.label: Text Index Tags
result.name: text_index_tags
result.value_description: If "everyone_only", index tags shared with everyone. If "all_shared", index tags shared with groups and users or everyone. If "none", index no tags.

result.description: This property allows for table specific compaction threshold for minimum reclaim percentage instead of the global compaction threshold.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any table which meets compaction criteria
result.label: min_reclaim_percentage
result.name: min_reclaim_percentage

result.description: Causes an icon (either a "+" or a "-") to appear next to the field's label, allowing the field itself to be expanded or collapsed.
result.label: Ro collapsible
result.name: ro_collapsible

result.description: When true, causes the conditions field to be rendered in any list view as a human-readable condition (instead of the encoded query actually stored in the database). The form view for this field is unaffected.
result.label: Readable
result.name: readable

result.description: Determines if the form cache should be flushed after saving the m2m slushbucket
result.label: M2M form related
result.name: m2m_form_related

result.description: Attribute will enable the barcode scanner input helper if available.
result.label: Enable barcode scanner
result.name: barcode
result.value_description: Set value to 'true' to enable the input helper.

result.description: Forces all row deletes to be executed iteratively. Otherwise, some deletes may be performed using a more efficient bulk method.
result.label: Iterative delete
result.name: iterativeDelete

result.description: Causes an icon (an envelope) to appear on the right side of the form's navigation bar, just to the left of the up and down arrows. If clicked, a popup email client appears.
result.label: Email client
result.name: email_client

result.description: Adds the sys_id field to available list in a field List
result.label: Include sys_id in Field List
result.name: include_sys_id_in_fieldlist

result.description: Sets the default lock on the glidelist display
result.label: Start Locked
result.name: start_locked

result.description: If true, this field will not be mapped during an import set. This is primarily used for LDAP imports.
result.label: No auto map
result.name: no_auto_map

result.description: If put on a table, it will disable indexing for this table and it's child tables.If put on a column and a table is text indexed, this attribute will prevent this field from being included in the text index.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any field/table to disable text index.
result.label: No text index
result.name: no_text_index

result.description: Specifies the interval of metrics collection.
result.label: Collection interval
result.name: collection_interval
result.value_description: Interval specified as "HH:MM:SS" (like "01:02:30" for one hour, two minutes, and thirty seconds)

result.description:
If present or true, HTML sanitization is enabled for the selected field.
By default HTML Sanitization is done on all HTML and Translated HTML fields. Set this attribute to false to disable sanitization.
result.applies_to_description:
It applies to HTML and Translated HTML fields.
By default HTML Sanitization is done on all HTML and Translated HTML fields. Set this attribute to false to disable sanitization.
result.label: HTML Sanitize
result.name: html_sanitize
result.value_description:
By default HTML Sanitization is done on all HTML and Translated HTML fields. 
Set this attribute to false to disable sanitization.

result.description: Setting this attribute to true on a field will force the default value specified in the dictionary to override any value that the url tries to specify.  This is for when navgating to a new record from a related list.
result.label: List Force Default
result.name: list_force_default

result.description: Creates a toggle option on the activity formatter header for incidents, tasks, and problems. The toggle provides the choice between between the Live Feed for that record (also known as a document feed) or the activity formatter fields already in use.
result.label: Live feed
result.name: live_feed

result.description: Defines which type of tokenizer to be used in text search
result.label: Text index tokenizer language
result.name: text_index_tokenizer_language

result.description:
Enables production of time dimension data for use by OLAP (to produce reports based on quarters, weeks, or other time periods).
Note: OLAP functionality has been deprecated. For reports based on time dimensions, see Trend Charts, Control Charts, or Trendbox Charts.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any field of date type (glide_date_time, glide_date, due_date, date, or datetime) in a table subclassed from the task table.
result.label: Time dimension
result.name: timeDimension

result.description: Prevents loading of sys_metadata_link rows for this table
result.label: Metadata Link Exempt
result.name: metadata_link_exempt

result.description: Displays the hierarchy of reference values in a tree display (such as locations).
result.applies_to_description: Applies to reference fields that have a reference to a hierarchical table.
result.label: Tree picker
result.name: tree_picker

result.description: Removes the base table from the choice list (see base_table for more details).
result.label: Skip root
result.name: skip_root

result.description: Defines the table that the script depends on.
result.label: Static dependent
result.name: staticDependent

result.description: Specifies a model variable within Java code. The model must have a class that implements the IVariablesModel interface.
result.label: Model class
result.name: model_class
result.value_description: A binary Java class name.

result.description: Enables or disables the Condition Count Widget to preview how many records would be returned by a set of conditions.
result.label: Show condition count
result.name: show_condition_count

result.description: The table is picked up by periodically scheduled compaction job if it meets compaction criteria.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any table which meets compaction criteria
result.label: Do Optimize
result.name: do_optimize

result.description: Specifies if the table or the field should be excluded when storing drafts for auto recovery
result.label: Exclude Auto Recovery
result.name: exclude_auto_recovery

result.description: Causes auto-complete to work with all fields specified in the ref_ac_columns attribute. This overrides the default behavior, which searches only the display value column.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any reference column with an auto completer.
result.label: Reference auto completer columns search
result.name: ref_ac_columns_search

result.description: Defines the tables for which this field determines the end (close) time of an SLA.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any column of date type (glide_date_time, glide_date, due_date, date, or datetime)
result.label: SLA closure
result.name: sla_closure
result.value_description: A list of table names separated by semicolons (";").

result.description: If present or true, you can change this field without skipping updates to the rest of the record. During software upgrades, the value of this field is preserved, while the rest of the record receives upgrades. By default, the Active field on a tracked table is treated as update_exempt even if the attribute is not present.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any field whose table has update_synch set to true.
result.label: Update exempt
result.name: update_exempt

result.description: Marks this table as "large" for the purpose of preventing table locking with specific MySQL database operations (adding/removing a column/index, compacting a table). Without this attribute (or the smallTable attribute), whether a table is large is determined by the glide.db.large.threshold property, or the default value of 5,000.
result.label: Large table
result.name: largeTable

result.description: Allows the user to select a field from the dependent table (or current if dependent is not specified).
result.applies_to_description: This is used in some workflow activities.
result.label: Field list selector
result.name: field_list_selector

result.description: Marks this table as not participating in domain separation.
result.label: No separation
result.name: no_separation

result.description: If present or true, this field will only be updated during upgrades or plugin activation. It will not be updated by importing XML
result.label: Plugin upgrade update only
result.name: plugin_upgrade_update_only

result.description: Forces an update of the left side of a many-to-many relationship if the right side was updated.
result.label: Update M2M on bucket save
result.name: update_m2m_on_bucket_save

result.description: Specifies a named format to use instead of the standard numeric formatting.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any numeric field.
result.label: Format
result.name: format
result.value_description:
One of these two format names:
glide_duration: formats a time specified in milliseconds as ddd hh:mm:ss.
none: disables automatic number formatting (for example, changes 2,500 to 2500).

result.description: Defines columns that are critical information about an application. This allows tracking the entry of critical information.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any column on the apm_application table. This table is created by a plugin that is not loaded by default.
result.label: Critical
result.name: critical

result.description: Causes workflow to be used instead of delivery plans.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any table that has delivery plans or uses workflow.
result.label: Use workflow
result.name: use_workflow

result.description: Specifies whether queries against this element are assumed to likely be selective, triggering low-level query optimizations (e.g. Union optimizations)
result.label: Is Selective
result.name: is_selective
result.value_description:
True: queries against this field are likley to be highly selective (i.e. produce smaller result sets)
False: [DEFAULT] queries against this field are not likely to be highly selective

result.description: Specifies a JavaScript function to implement a custom knowledge search (see knowledge_search).
result.label: Knowledge custom
result.name: knowledge_custom
result.value_description: Name of JavaScript function.

result.description: Determines if the m2m record invokes package dependency recorder after a m2m slushbucket save is completed
result.label: M2M track dependency
result.name: m2m_track_dependency

result.description: Specifies the columns in the referenced table that should be used to order the choice list. This works like an ORDER BY clause in SQL, with each element in ascending order.
result.label: Reference sequence
result.name: ref_sequence
result.value_description: A list of fields in referenced table, separated by top hats ("^").

result.description: If present or true, allows entering "None" as the field.
result.label: Allow null
result.name: allow_null

result.description: Defines the tables for which this field determines the start (open) time of an SLA.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any column of date type (glide_date_time, glide_date, due_date, date, or datetime).
result.label: SLA basis
result.name: sla_basis
result.value_description: A list of table names separated by semicolons (";").

result.description:
This attribute will skip unloading the fields for specific install contexts based on the values set for this attribute. Takes values exempt_always, exempt_never and exempt_vcs_only.
If the value is exempt_always, field will be skipped from writing to xml for all install contexts
If the vaue is exempt_never, field will not be skipped from writing to xml
If the value is exempt_vcs_only, field will be skipped from writing to xml only in source control context
result.label: Saver Exempt
result.name: saver_exempt

result.description: Excludes this table (and any of its descendant tables) or column from being recorded for rollback
result.label: Exclude from rollback
result.name: excludeFromRollback
result.value_description: True to exclude this table and all of its descendants from rollback. By default, most tables are recorded, with some tables explicitly excluded. For that reason, setting this attribute to 'true' will have no effect.

result.description: Specifies the title to use in a list banner.
result.label: Reference list label
result.name: ref_list_label
result.value_description: Label text.

result.description: Specifies the name of the synthetic dictionary table used to hold the variable definitions for a particular variable model.
result.applies_to_description: Any reference column on a model table that is a reference to the sys_dictionary table.
result.label: M2M new
result.name: m2m_new
result.value_description: Must contain "name=table name", where "table name" is the name of the synthetic dictionary table used for a model variable.

result.description: Hides the select multiple icon.
result.label: No multiple
result.name: no_multiple

result.description: Attribute to set audit level for document viewer
result.label: Document Viewer Audit
result.name: document_viewer_audit
result.value_description: Valid values are 'view', 'download' or 'all'

result.description: Specifies a JavaScript class that produces workflow icons.
result.label: Icons
result.name: icons
result.value_description: Name of JavaScript class.

result.description: If true, attachments on the table are indexed for search purposes.
result.label: Attachment index
result.name: attachment_index

result.description: Some field types have incorrect behavior with the update operation. For e.g. A Date or Date/Time field will be updated if two back-to-back updates are performed even when no fields are specified to be updated. This attribute will change the behavior of fields with these defaulting types to enforce correct updates.
result.applies_to_description: Applying the attribute to the table will enforce the new update behavior for all fields with defaulting types that the table contains. Applying the attribute to a field will enforce the new update behavior if the field has a defaulting type. Update behavior of fields with non-defaulting types will not be affected.
result.label: Fix Multiple Updates Behavior
result.name: fix_multiple_updates_behavior

result.description: Makes this table visible globally even if there are domain restrictions (that is, the sys_domain field has a value).
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any table with a sys_domain column.
result.label: Global visibility
result.name: global_visibility

result.description:
Default query mode for text index record
Must be one of IR_AND_QUERY, IR_OR_QUERY, IR_AND_OR_QUERY
result.label: Text index default query mode
result.name: text_index_default_query_mode

result.description: Identifies the default working state value for a task table.
result.label: Default work state
result.name: default_work_state
result.value_description: State integer value

result.description: Turns on the ability to see a tables full hierarchy in the class picker
result.label: Full Hierarchy
result.name: full_hierarchy

result.description: Causes the field to render with container (split) types as well other types.
result.label: Image container types
result.name: image_container_types

result.description: Displays the hierarchy of reference values in a tree display for glide_list field type column.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to List fields that have a reference to a hierarchical table.
result.label: Tree picker
result.name: tree_picker

result.description:
Check whether data is should be normalized through the "ip_data_control" attribute.
If the attribute is "none": No conversion will happen and data will be inserted as-is
If the attribute is "canonical": Values will be inserted in their smaller canonical form
If the attribute is "expanded": Values will be inserted in the larger expanded form to facilitate comparisons
If the attribute is "canonicalize_when_possible": Values will be inserted in canonical form when it is a valid IP or as-is when it is not
result.label: IP Data Control
result.name: ip_data_control
result.value_description:
none
canonical
expanded
canonicalize_when_possible

result.description: Controls the relative importance of a match in the field for text search.
result.label: Text search weight
result.name: ts_weight

result.description: Exclude attachments on this table from being antivirus scanned
result.label: Exclude from antivirus scan
result.name: exclude_from_antivirus_scan

result.description: Default partial matching rule for text index record
result.sys_name: Text index default partial matching rule
result.label: Text index default partial matching rule
result.name: text_index_default_partial_matching_rule

result.description: If true, a tree is displayed to select from that includes reference fields so you can dot-walk.
result.label: Allow references
result.name: allow_references

result.description: Reference to a scope prefixed Script Include that has an uninstall(sysID, appID, tableName) function used to delete an application record duing an application uninstall.
result.applies_to_description: Table that extends 'Application File' whose records during an application uninstall require custom deletion logic
result.label: Uninstall handler
result.name: uninstall_handler
result.value_description: The name of a Script Include prefixed with its scope name (global.UninstallScript).  Since an application uninstall executes as part of the 'Scoped App Client' application, the Script Include will need to be Accessible From > All Application Scopes.

result.description: This property allows for table specific compaction threshold for minimum reclaim size instead of the global compaction threshold.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any table which meets compaction criteria
result.label: min_reclaim_size_mb
result.name: min_reclaim_size_mb

result.description: The color variant name of the journal tile icon's background for the workspace activity stream. The color variant names are theme based and also represent the color used when no theme is applied.
result.label: Workspace activity stream icon color
result.name: ws_activity_tile_icon_color_variant
result.value_description: neutralyellowmagentapinkorangebrowngreengreen-yellowblue

result.description: Prevents TableCleaner run on the specified table.
result.label: Disable Table Cleaner
result.name: disableTableCleaner

result.description: Add joins for a FX Currency field in a query for a table containing the field in a lazy manner so that all other joins are given priority.
result.applies_to_description: Specific to FX Currency field
result.label: Currency Lazy Join
result.name: currency_lazy_join
result.value_description: True to indicate that a join to currency instance table should not be added until all other joins are added

result.description: Set the value to false to disable the junk filter for the table. By default, Zing does not index or search for 2-digit numbers and single character words (unless they are Chinese or Japanese characters). You must regenerate the index after disabling the junk filter. This attribute results in a larger table index. For optimal performance, do not apply it unless it is required.
result.label: Text index filter junk
result.name: text_index_filter_junk

result.description: Hides the view selected item icon.
result.label: No view
result.name: no_view

result.description: Limits the tables listed to those that are searchable by text.
result.label: Text search only
result.name: text_search_only

result.description: Tables with the onlineAlter attribute perform MySQL database operations using online schema changes. Online schema changes provides a lock-free table upgrade when adding, modifying, or removing columns and when adding or dropping indexes. Without online schema changes, these changes to the database lock write access during execution. Online schema changes use additional system resources. The Online alter (onlineAlter) attribute is available with the Calgary release and is enabled by default for all tables. Oracle databases do not lock tables by default and do not use online schema changes.
result.label: Online alter
result.name: onlineAlter

result.description: Specifies custom update producer (a Java class) that handles update set production for this table.
result.label: Update synch custom
result.name: update_synch_custom
result.value_description: A binary Java class name.

result.description: This uses three values to set the display of the field_value field.
result.label: Fv
result.name: fv
result.value_description:
The following three values, delimited by (;)
table name; field name; sys_id

result.description: Specifies the field in the parent record that contains the reference time zone for this field.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any date or date time column.
result.label: Time zone field
result.name: time_zone_field
result.value_description: Name of the column containing he time zone.

result.description: Marks this table as "small" (that is, not large) for the purposes of our querying strategy. Without this attribute (or the largeTable attribute), whether a table is large is determined by the glide.db.large.threshold property, or the default value of 5,000.
result.label: Small table
result.name: smallTable

result.description: Setting this attribute to an encoded query restricts the Slushbucket view of the many-to-many table to include only those queried items.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any many-to-many table.
result.label: M2M restrictor
result.name: m2mRestrictor
result.value_description: An encoded query. For instance, m2mRestrictor=active=true would restrict the Slushbucket to display only records on the many-to-many table which are active.

result.description: Causes the reference field to hide a the display value column so that auto-complete only matches text from the columns listed in the ref_ac_columns attribute. This feature requires the use of the AJAXTableCompleter class and the ref_ac_columns, ref_ac_columns_search, and ref_ac_display_value attributes.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any reference field with an auto completer.
result.label: Reference auto completer display value
result.name: ref_ac_display_value

result.description: Identifies the list of inactive state values.
result.label: Close states
result.name: close_states
result.value_description: Inactive state integer values delimited by semicolons (;)

result.description: Allows Document Tables to be shown in a Table Choice List
result.label: Include Document Tables
result.name: include_document_tables
result.value_description: True: shows document tables in a Table Choice List

result.description: Limits the fields display to the specified types.
result.label: Types
result.name: types
result.value_description: list of valid element types separated by semicolons (";").

result.description: In a list view, this attribute shows the entire text value of the multi-text value in a list, without truncating it. Without this attribute the string is truncated based on the UI Property 'Number of characters displayed in list cells' which is 40 by default.
result.label: No truncate
result.name: no_truncate

result.description: Causes the named UI Macro to be invoked when the field is rendered on a form.
result.label: Reference contributions
result.name: ref_contributions
result.value_description: A list of UI Macro names, separated by semi-colons.

result.description: Long or short labels refer to the label that is displayed for reference fields on a form. For example, if the field contains the caller's email address, the long label would be "Caller Email" while the short label would just be "Email." Usually the placement of the field on the form makes it clear what the field represents. The global property (glide.short.labels) is used to specify the type of labels that are displayed for all reference fields on any form. This global property can be overridden for any field by setting the short_label=true or long_label=true attribute for the field in the Dictionary.
result.label: Short label
result.name: short_label

result.description: Limit for search results under which the default AND query is changed to OR query
result.label: Text search and-or limit
result.name: text_search_and_or_limit
result.value_description: Negative value is treated as 0

result.description: Specifies the business rule with the script that will be run to generate the query to determine the elements on the right side of the many-to-many relationship when the M2M query generator (mtmquerygenerator) attribute is set to com.glide.misc.ScriptedListGenerator.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any reference field for a many-to-many relationship.
result.label: M2M query script
result.name: mtmqueryscript
result.value_description: Name of a business rule.

result.description: Stores the numeric representation of an IPv6 address used for IPv6 address range comparisons and related calculations
result.applies_to_description: This attribute is only applicable to fields that store IPv6 address in numeric format for ease of comparison, range calculations, etc.
result.label: IPv6 Address Comparable
result.name: ipv6_address_comparable

result.description: Similar to update_synch but writes the record's file attachments to update sets.
result.label: Synch attachments
result.name: synch_attachments

result.description: When set, synchronizes offline action timestamps with the specified datetime element
result.label: Offline timestamp field
result.name: offline_timestamp_field

result.description:
Attributes wth this attributeset to true are exempt from
			subscription fulfillment considerations
result.label: Fulfillment Exempt
result.name: fulfillment_exempt
result.value_description: Applicable only for fulfillment tables

result.description: Specifies the field on the left hand side of the relationship that specifies a value that will limit the items on the right hand side. See mtmlimittable for a variant of this.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any reference field for a many-to-many relationship.
result.label: M2M limit field
result.name: mtmlimitfield

result.description: Hide match operators on conditions field type. By default value is false
result.label: Hide Match Operators
result.name: hide_match_operators

result.description: If present or true, disables the usual "Execute Now" button. This is used by applications using schedules (such as Discovery) to substitute their own more appropriate action.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any table derived from sys_auto.
result.label: Disable execute now
result.name: disable_execute_now

result.description: A colon separated list of tables that will be allowed along with its application tables
result.applies_to_description: Apply to table_name fields or sys_db_object reference fields which are scope protected to also allow the specified tables
result.label: Allow tables
result.name: allow_tables

result.description: Prevents the attachment icon (a paperclip) from appearing on the form's navigation bar (just to the left of the up and down arrows).
result.label: No attachment
result.name: no_attachment

result.description: Causes any user preferences to be used instead of the normal default value.
result.label: User preference
result.name: user_preference

result.description: Causes a call to a JavaScript function named <tableName>_<fieldName>Listen, or globalListen if that function does not exist. The function is called with arguments (tableName, fieldName, oldValue, newValue).
result.label: Listen
result.name: listen

result.description: Deprecated: Please use editor.toolbar instead.
result.label: TinyMCE Toolbar
result.name: tinymce_toolbar1
result.value_description:
A semicolon separated list of values(e.g. bold;italic;underline;|;forecolor;styleselect), or a script include(e.g javascript:myCustomConfig())
Deprecated: Please use editor.toolbar instead.

result.label: JSON View
result.name: json_view
result.value_description: Enables the JSON View popup link after the Field Label on JSON field types

result.description: Identifies a reference field in the record that has the model defined for it. For example, a workflow activity is associated with an activity definition. The activity definition has a related list of questions that make up the model for that activity definition. By using the activity_definition as the model_field for the activity, the model for the workflow activity is built by reading the questions that are defined for the referenced activity definition.
result.label: Model field
result.name: model_field
result.value_description: The name of a reference field.

result.description: Set the default number of rows in a multitext field.
result.label: Default rows
result.name: default_rows

result.description: Specifies the table to use instead of the table on the left hand side of a relationship, when a M2M limit field (mtmlimitfield) attribute is present.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any reference field that has a M2M limit field (mtmlimitfield) attribute.
result.label: M2M limit table
result.name: mtmlimittable

result.description: When set to true , it will allow relative url in workspace URL field type
result.label: Allow Relative URL
result.name: allow_relative_url

result.description: If true, excludes data fabric tables from a table choice list
result.label: No Data fabric Tables
result.name: no_df_tables

result.description: The fields of the table are used to perform the lookup using a 'matcher'. Approvals are specified as fields in the table that have an attribute of 'approval_user=<field_name>', where <field_name> indicates the field in the table that contains the user(s) for this approval type. Fields with this attribute contain an integer value that indicates the sequence for the approvals. All approval fields with the same sequence number indicate that multiple approvals are required before continuing. Approvals are requested in the order of the sequence numbers. For example, all approvals with sequence number 100 must be approved before approvals with sequence number 200 are requested.
result.label: Approval user
result.name: approval_user
result.value_description: Name of field containing the user(s) for the approval type this field represents

result.description: Forces records related by a many-to-many relationship to be ordered by the order field.
result.label: M2M maintain order
result.name: m2mMaintainOrder

result.description: Specifies a custom popup processor for processing the column (or all columns in a table).
result.label: Popup processor
result.name: popup_processor
result.value_description: A binary Java class name.

result.description: Specifies the name of a JavaScript class (client side) that creates the drop-down auto completion choices. Can be equal to AJAXTableCompleter or AJAXReferenceChoice.
result.applies_to_description: If applied to a table the attribute is applied to all reference columns on the table.
result.label: Reference auto completer
result.name: ref_auto_completer
result.value_description: A JavaScript class name.

result.description: If true, a sys_audit_delete record will never be created when a record from this table is deleted. Meant for high-activity tables that never need sys_audit_delete information.
result.label: No audit delete
result.name: no_audit_delete

result.description: Prevents related list assoicated with this table from being scope protected when rendered on an out-of-scope and thus read-only form.
result.label: No List Protection
result.name: no_list_protection

result.description: Long or short labels refer to the label that is displayed for reference fields on a form. For example, if the field contains the caller's email address, the long label would be "Caller Email" while the short label would just be "Email." Usually the placement of the field on the form makes it clear what the field represents. The global property (glide.short.labels) is used to specify the type of labels that are displayed for all reference fields on any form. This global property can be overridden for any field by setting the short_label=true or long_label=true attribute for the field in the Dictionary.
result.label: Long label
result.name: long_label

result.description: Specifies the alternative form to be used when this table is referenced through a popup on a reference field.
result.label: Target form
result.name: target_form
result.value_description: Name of a form.

result.description: Causes this field to not be audited, even if the table is being audited.
result.label: No audit
result.name: no_audit

result.description: Attachments will not be checked for and deleted when a record from this table is deleted. Meant for high-activity tables that never have attachments.
result.label: No attachments
result.name: no_attachments

result.description: Tells the workflow engine to listen for changes to the table, firing events to a workflow when a record associated with a particular workflow has changed.
result.label: Has workflow
result.name: hasWorkflow

result.description: Specifies the field that determines what language will be used to index a record for text search.
result.label: Text Search Index Language
result.name: ts_language

result.description: Prevents users from expanding the field from a form or list Slush Bucket.
result.label: Slushbucket reference no expand
result.name: slushbucket_ref_no_expand

result.description: Similar to ref_contributions, causes the named UI Macro to be invoked when the field is rendered on a form.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to most columns.
result.label: Field decorations
result.name: field_decorations
result.value_description: UI Macro name list, separated by semicolons (";").

result.applies_to_description: Omit embedded lists from slushbucket
result.label: Slushbucket omit embedded lists
result.name: slushbucket_omit_embedded

result.description: Specifies an image file to be used when the table is used in a module or BSM map. This specification overrides the icons that would otherwise be used for the table.
result.label: Image
result.name: image
result.value_description: Relative path of image file.

result.description: The name of a script include whose process() method returns an array of table names from which to select.
result.label: Table choices script
result.name: tableChoicesScript
result.value_description: Name of a script include.

result.description: This property allows for table specific compaction threshold for maximum table size instead of the global compaction threshold.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any table which meets compaction criteria
result.label: max_table_size_mb
result.name: max_table_size_mb

result.description: The journal tile's and compose component's icon for the workspace activity stream.
result.label: Workspace activity stream tile icon
result.name: ws_activity_tile_icon

result.description: If present or true, this field will not be loaded during upgrades, team development pushes and pulls, application installs, update set commits, or version reverts. It will not even be initialized by the loaders.
result.label: Loader exempt
result.name: loader_exempt

result.description: Declares that RecordLock should use fields in this table directly, rather than creating rows in sys_mutex. This table must have the following fields: sys_lock_owner (string(100)), sys_lock_acquired (datetime), sys_lock_touched (datetime).
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any table for which RecordLock is used.
result.label: Supports Native RecordLock
result.name: native_recordlock

result.description:
If present, HTML Sanitization is enabled using the specified config. 
By default HTML Sanitization is done on all HTML and Translated HTML fields using the platform sanitizer. To use Embedded Help sanitizer, set html_sanitize_config attribute to EmbeddedHelpSanitizerConfig.
result.applies_to_description:
It applies to HTML and Translated HTML fields.
By default HTML Sanitization is done on all HTML and Translated HTML fields. Run specific sanitizer by setting this attribute to the config name.
result.label: HTML Sanitize Config
result.name: html_sanitize_config
result.value_description:
By default HTML Sanitization is done on all HTML and Translated HTML fields. 
Set this attribute to run a specific sanitizer config.

result.description: Store the table descriptor in the short lived cache
result.label: Store in short lived cache
result.name: store_in_short_lived_cache

result.description: Specifies the roles that the items on the right side of the many-to-many relationship must have when the M2M query generator (mtmquerygenerator) attribute is set to com.glide.misc.HasRoleM2MListGenerator.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any reference field for a many-to-many relationship.
result.label: M2M query role
result.name: mtmqueryrole
result.value_description: A list of roles separated by periods (".").

result.description: If false, causes the table cleaner to perform cleanup operations without a pause between each operation.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any table affected by the table cleaner.
result.label: Nibble sleep
result.name: nibble_sleep

result.description: Specifies the column that contains the comma-separated list of columns that the conditions should be restricted to using.
result.label: Restrict to
result.name: restrictTo
result.value_description: A field name (including indirect, dot-walked field references).

result.description:
Normally strings containing multi-byte Unicode characters are encoded/decoded by Glide when saving/retrieving
      them from the database. That is to overcome MySQL utf8 charset limitation. The setting allows to disable such
      encoding on per-type and per-element basis. Make it false for reference types such as sysId, reference, etc.
result.label: Encode UTF8
result.name: encode_utf8

result.description: Displays the fields of the table specified.
result.label: Table
result.name: table

result.description: If present and false, prevents the use of Oracle prepared queries on the table.
result.label: Oracle ps query
result.name: glide.db.oracle.ps.query

result.label: Localize Display Value
result.name: com.glide.precise_time.localize
result.value_description:
false -> Display time in UTC
      true -> Localize to user's timezone

result.description: Attribute will enable the current location input helper if available.
result.label: Enable current location input helper
result.name: current_location
result.value_description: Set value to 'true' to enable the input helper.

result.description: Causes a knowledge search icon (a small book) to appear next to the field. Clicking this icon launches a pop-up window for searching the knowledge base, unless a custom knowledge search function has been specified (see knowledge_custom).
result.label: Knowledge search
result.name: knowledge_search

result.description: Prevents the system from creating sys_mod_count, sys_updated_by, sys_updated_on fields in the table when it is created. Does not stop the table from being updated. This attribute is used to save space on high volume system tables, such as syslog and sys_audit.
result.applies_to_description: Is true for tables in which records are inserted or deleted but not updated.
result.label: No update
result.name: no_update

result.description: Specifies the maximum number of records the table cleaner can delete in a single operation.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any table affected by the table cleaner.
result.label: Nibble size
result.name: nibble_size
result.value_description: Must be a positive integer. The default value for this attribute is 250.

result.description: Causes a name mode toggle icon (a small right-pointing triangle) to appear to the right of the label. Clicking this icon causes the field's rendering to change from a text field accepting <tablename>.<fieldname> to a pair of reference choice boxes (one for the table, the other for the field). The latter is the default.
result.label: Mode toggler
result.name: mode_toggler

result.description: Determines whether we will show the operators on a template_value field or if all assignments are static.
result.label: Show operators
result.name: show_ops
result.value_description: true

result.description: Attempts to remove HTML tags from a field when that field is exported to a PDF.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to all columns, but common use case is for HTML columns.
result.label: Strip HTML in PDF
result.name: strip_html_in_pdf

result.description: Identifies the default close state value for a task table.
result.label: Default close state
result.name: default_close_state
result.value_description: State integer value

result.description: Defines the remote (such as, in another database) table that the script depends on.
result.label: Remote dependent
result.name: remoteDependent
result.value_description: A name of database and table (like "model.matcher").

result.description: Allows public content as well as in scope content
result.applies_to_description: Apply to table_name fields or sys_db_object reference fields which are scope protected to also allow public tables
result.label: Allow public
result.name: allow_public

result.description: The color variant name of the journal tile's and compose component's background for the workspace activity stream. The color variant names are theme based and also represent the color used when no theme is applied.
result.label: Workspace activity stream background
result.name: ws_activity_tile_color_variant
result.value_description: neutralyellowmagentapinkorangebrowngreengreen-yellowblue

result.description: Specifies the Java class that generates the query to determine the elements on the right side of the many-to-many relationship.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any reference field for a many-to-many relationship.
result.label: M2M query generator
result.name: mtmquerygenerator
result.value_description: A binary Java class name.

result.description: Specifies the columns whose display values should appear in an auto completion list in addition to the name. See the cmdb_ci field ("Configuration Item") on the Incident form for a working example.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any reference field with an auto completer.
result.label: Reference auto completer columns
result.name: ref_ac_columns
result.value_description: A list of column names separated by semi-columns.

result.description: Marks this table as being the target of a label at some point. This attribute can be set manually, but it is set automatically whenever a label is generated. When true, the label engine will run on any change to the table, updating the labels as needed.
result.label: Has labels
result.name: hasLabels

result.description: Do not audit relations for this reference field
result.label: No audit relation
result.name: no_audit_relation
result.value_description:
True: don't audit relations (i.e .don't create sys_audit_relation records) against the referenced record when the parent record is deleted
False: (Default) audit relation changes

result.description: Allows you to write a script to define what will be loaded into the Slush Bucket field.
result.label: Script
result.name: script
result.value_description: A function that returns the contents of the field.

result.applies_to_description: Suppress email notifications sent by antivirus scanner when a file is infected
result.label: Suppress antivirus email notification
result.name: suppress_antivirus_email_notification

result.description: Specifies a list of fields to be used when constructing the description of a calendar event. If not specified, the usual display name plus short description are used.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any calendar event table.
result.label: Calendar elements
result.name: calendar_elements
result.value_description: List of field names, separated by semicolons (";")

result.description: Attribute to enable or disable document viewer to preview attachments
result.label: Use Document Viewer
result.name: use_document_viewer

result.description: Specifies a list of columns to be sent back to the server in order to get an updated reference.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any reference field with a reference qualifier specified.
result.label: Reference qualifier elements
result.name: ref_qual_elements
result.value_description: A list of column names, separated by semi-colons.

result.description: If true, the email box is removed from the glide_list field like the "Watch list" field.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any List field referencing User.
result.label: No email
result.name: no_email

result.description: Marks this table as available for listeners to get events (insert, update, delete) on.
result.label: Has listeners
result.name: hasListeners

result.description: Depracated: Please use editor.toolbar instead.
result.label: TinyMCE Toolbar 2
result.name: tinymce_toolbar2
result.value_description:
A semicolon separated list of values(e.g. bold;italic;underline;|;forecolor;styleselect), or a script include(e.g javascript:myCustomConfig())
Depracated: Please use editor.toolbar instead.

result.description: Specifies if the table should be included when storing drafts for auto recovery
result.label: Include Auto Recovery
result.name: include_auto_recovery

result.description: This attribute identifies script fields intended for client scripts. When present the system only displays suggestions from the client API.
result.label: Client Script
result.name: client_script

result.description: Enable IDF score for the Text Index
result.label: Text search Enable IDF
result.name: text_index_enable_idf

result.description: Limits the reference fields that are displayed in the tree to the specified types.
result.label: Reference types
result.name: reference_types
result.value_description: A list of valid reference types that are clickable separated by semicolons (";").

result.description: Specifies the field that contains the repeat type (daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly).
result.applies_to_description: Applies to a Repeat Count column for schedule rotation.
result.label: Repeat type field
result.name: repeat_type_field

result.description: Table should only have records in tables that extend it. For example, the "task" table has this attribute because you would create incident, problem, change records and not task records.
result.label: Extensions only
result.name: extensions_only

result.description: Applicable to columns in tables in Table-Per-Partition (TPP) extension model. Set this attribute to true to mark a column to be synchronized on migration to TPP. Adding this property after migration or without ever migrating will have no effect.
result.label: Synchronize across partitions
result.name: synchronizePartitions
result.value_description:
True to mark a column to be synchronized on migration to partitioned extension model (TPP). This attribute has no effect on a column in a table already in TPP.
Setting this attribute to false is equivalent to not having this attribute at all (as false is the default).

result.description: Prevents the MySQL table compaction operation from running on the specified table. The table compaction operation normally runs after the table cleaner deletes at least 50% of the data in the specified table.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any table affected by the table cleaner.
result.label: No optimize
result.name: no_optimize

result.description: A script to generate a ChoiceList
result.applies_to_description: Script that returns a ChoiceList for use as the choices for this column.
result.label: Choice Script
result.name: choice_script
result.value_description: Must be a script that returns a ChoiceList

result.description: Determines if the m2m parent record invokes its update saver after a m2m slushbucket save is completed
result.label: M2M parent update synch
result.name: m2m_parent_update_synch

result.description: If true, excludes remote tables from a table choice list
result.label: No Remote Tables
result.name: no_remote_tables

result.description: Specifies the column that will be used to order the auto completion list.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any reference field with an auto completer.
result.label: Reference auto completer order by
result.name: ref_ac_order_by

result.description: This attribute is to specify `autocomplete` attribute to this field in Forms so that this field is auto-fillable based on the attribute value.
result.label: Autocomplete
result.name: autocomplete
result.value_description: Values can be as per the list of values supported by html attribute `autocomplete`. Reference: https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG21/Techniques/html/H98.

result.description: This property allows for table specific compaction threshold for maximum row count instead of the global compaction threshold.
result.applies_to_description: Applies to any table which meets compaction criteria
result.label: max_row_count
result.name: max_row_count

result.description: A table attribute to specify the name of column in the table which points to the parent record
result.label: Copied From column
result.name: copied_from_column
result.value_description:
Name of the column. 
Set "false" if you want to disable it.

result.description: If true, the record in this table won't be archived.  It is used to exclude specific peripheral record tables from archiving
result.label: No archive
result.name: no_archive
